requirements.summary: Implement responsive layout for the home page hero section and feature cards to adapt to mobile screen sizes (320px-768px)
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section stacks vertically on mobile devices
Feature cards reflow to single column on screens below 768px
Text remains readable without horizontal scrolling
Touch targets meet minimum 44x44px size

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind responsive utilities to hero section and feature cards. Use flexbox with flex-col on mobile (default) and flex-row on md: breakpoint for hero. Convert feature card grid to single column on mobile (grid-cols-1) and multi-column on larger screens (sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3). Ensure all interactive elements have min-h-11 min-w-11 (44px) for touch targets. Add responsive text sizing (text-2xl sm:text-4xl for headings). Reference the generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/beyblade-x-arena-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png and ensure it scales properly with bg-cover and bg-center.

requirements.summary: Make the application header (AppHeader) responsive with collapsible navigation for mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu collapses into a hamburger icon on mobile
All header actions remain accessible on small screens
Logo and branding scale appropriately
Login button and profile controls are touch-friendly

file_operations.description: Add mobile hamburger menu using state toggle. Hide desktop navigation links on mobile with hidden md:flex. Create mobile menu drawer/dropdown that appears when hamburger is clicked. Use Tailwind responsive utilities for logo sizing (w-8 h-8 sm:w-10 sm:h-10). Ensure LoginButton and all navigation items have touch-friendly sizing (min-h-11 px-4). Add proper spacing between mobile menu items (space-y-4). Reference the logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/beyblade-x-teams-logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure it renders at appropriate sizes across breakpoints.

requirements.summary: Optimize team list and team detail pages for mobile viewing with responsive grids and touch-optimized controls
acceptanceCriteria: Team grid adapts to 1-2 columns on mobile
Team icons and cards scale appropriately for small screens
Join request button and team actions are touch-accessible
Video gallery displays properly on mobile with appropriate sizing

file_operations.description: Update team grid to use responsive columns: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4. Ensure team cards have proper padding (p-4 sm:p-6) and team icons scale appropriately (w-16 h-16 sm:w-20 sm:h-20). Add responsive gap spacing (gap-4 sm:gap-6). Ensure all clickable card areas and navigation buttons meet 44x44px touch target minimum.

Make team detail layout stack vertically on mobile with flex-col md:flex-row for side-by-side sections on desktop. Ensure team icon, action buttons, and member lists use responsive sizing. Apply min-h-11 to all action buttons (join, disband, etc). Add responsive padding and margins (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8). Ensure the footage uploader and gallery sections adapt to mobile viewport.

Update video gallery grid to use responsive columns: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3. Ensure video elements have max-w-full and h-auto for proper scaling. Add responsive gap spacing (gap-3 sm:gap-4). Ensure video controls remain accessible on touch devices.

Ensure button has touch-friendly sizing with min-h-11 and adequate horizontal padding (px-6 sm:px-8). Use responsive text sizing (text-sm sm:text-base). Ensure disabled and loading states are clearly visible on mobile.

requirements.summary: Make forms and modals (profile setup, team creation, file uploaders) mobile-friendly with proper touch interactions
acceptanceCriteria: Input fields are appropriately sized for mobile keyboards
Modals fit within mobile viewport without overflow
File upload controls work with mobile file pickers
Form buttons are touch-optimized and properly spaced

file_operations.description: Add responsive modal sizing with max-w-xs sm:max-w-md. Ensure modal content has proper mobile padding (p-4 sm:p-6). Make input fields have min-h-11 for touch usability. Add responsive text sizing (text-base sm:text-lg for labels). Ensure submit button has adequate touch target size and spacing (min-h-11 mt-4).

Add responsive form layout with proper mobile padding (p-4 sm:p-6). Ensure all input fields have min-h-11 for touch interaction. Make form max-width responsive (max-w-xs sm:max-w-md lg:max-w-lg). Add responsive spacing between form elements (space-y-4 sm:space-y-6). Ensure submit button is touch-friendly (min-h-11 w-full sm:w-auto).

Ensure file input trigger button has touch-friendly sizing (min-h-11 px-4). Add responsive preview image sizing. Ensure clear button is adequately sized for touch (min-h-10 min-w-10). Add proper spacing between upload controls (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4).

Ensure file input trigger and upload buttons have touch-friendly sizing (min-h-11). Add responsive layout for upload controls with proper spacing. Ensure progress indicators and status messages are clearly visible on mobile. Use responsive text sizing for file information and validation messages.

requirements.summary: Ensure inbox and dashboard pages are fully responsive with readable mail content and accessible action buttons on mobile
acceptanceCriteria: Mail list and content adapt to mobile layout
Action buttons (approve/deny, read/delete) are touch-friendly
Dashboard cards stack vertically on small screens
All text content remains readable without zooming

file_operations.description: Convert inbox layout to stack vertically on mobile (flex-col md:flex-row for side-by-side on desktop). Make mail list take full width on mobile. Ensure all action buttons (mark read, delete, approve, deny) have min-h-11 and adequate spacing. Add responsive text sizing for mail content (text-sm sm:text-base). Ensure mail items are touch-friendly with proper padding (p-3 sm:p-4). Add responsive spacing between action buttons (space-x-2 sm:space-x-3).

Make dashboard cards stack vertically on mobile with grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3. Ensure cards have proper mobile padding (p-4 sm:p-6). Add responsive gap spacing (gap-4 sm:gap-6). Ensure navigation buttons and action items have touch-friendly sizing (min-h-11). Use responsive text sizing for card content and headings.

requirements.summary: Add viewport meta tag and ensure proper touch event handling across all interactive elements
acceptanceCriteria: Viewport meta tag is configured in index.html
Touch events work smoothly without delays
Prevent accidental double-tap zoom on buttons
Scrolling is smooth on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Add viewport meta tag in head: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=5.0, user-scalable=yes">. This ensures proper mobile rendering while allowing accessibility zoom up to 5x.

Add touch-action utilities and smooth scrolling to base layer. Add CSS rules: html { -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; scroll-behavior: smooth; } and button, a { touch-action: manipulation; } to prevent double-tap zoom on interactive elements while maintaining smooth scrolling. Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) to respect user motion preferences.

Verify responsive breakpoint configuration aligns with requirements (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px). Ensure touch-friendly spacing utilities are available. Add any custom mobile-specific utilities if needed for consistent touch target sizing across the app.
